Trigger.Name: Thunder
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Aggravated Assault

Trigger.Name: Close
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of House Arrest

Trigger.Name: Far
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Restraining Order

Trigger.Name: Off Debuff

Trigger.Name: Counter
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Decree Nisi

Trigger.Name: Send Alpha
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}\w+\b(?<!\bYou)) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi α.

Trigger.Name: Get Alpha
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}\w+\b(?<!\bYou)) (suffer|suffers) the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi a.

Trigger.Name: Debuff Final Off
Trigger.RegularExpression: You recovers from the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi

Trigger.Name: Initiate
Trigger.RegularExpression: Brute Justice readies Judgment Nisi

Trigger.Name: Final Decree Nisi
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z' -]+) gains the effect of Final Decree Nisi (?<nType>.*) from for (?<duration>\d+)

Trigger.Name: Final Judgment: Decree Nisi
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z' -]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi (?<nType>.*) from for

Trigger.Name: 3rd swap callout
Trigger.RegularExpression: Added new combatant Plasma Shield

Action.VariableExpression: 1: Same Side, Resolve in void, soak 3rd
2: Far Side, Resolve in void, soak 3rd
3: Stay, Bait Cone, South Limit Cut, Dodge Sacrament
4: Far, Bait Jump, North Limit Cut, Dodge Sacrament
5: Same Side, Soak 1st, Limit Cut South of Puddle
6: Far Side, Soak 1st, Limit Cut South of Puddle
7: Same Side, Soak 2nd, Limit Cut South of Puddle
8: Far Side, Soak 2nd, Limit Cut South of Puddle
